post_detail.title: McDonald's All American Games
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

Acting as user experience lead as well as tech lead on this project, I worked with the client to understand the goals of the project and the digital strategy driving the marketing efforts. In addition, I managed and executed the creation of wireframes, sitemaps, and user flows to ensure the goals were met. As a tech lead, I oversaw the front-end development and assisted whenever road blocks were encountered.

Execution:

ClickFire Media was asked by our client, Translation, to create a completely new site for the McDonald's All American Games, which would act as a framework for all of the content dating back to 1977 and into the future.
